items.sentence: I\'ve had it. All I\'ve done today is handle complaints.
Tom would\'ve called Mary if he\'d had her phone number.
Tom is probably going to have to go to Boston next week.
Tom moved to a company that offered him a higher salary.
Tom needs someone that he can discuss his problems with.
Tom has been invited to the Jacksons\' house for dinner.
Tom is trying to earn enough money to buy a new trumpet.
Tom is very good at sports, but not very good at school.
Tom knew better than to ask Mary such a stupid question.
The man waiting in the lobby wouldn\'t tell me his name.
